lead_paragraph: Macau tycoon David Chow is ripping up the fake volcano and Roman amphitheatre that were the show pieces of a failed theme park he built in the Chinese gaming enclave seven years ago.

headline.main: Macau Mogul Hopes Dinosaurs Trump Volcanoes in New Casino Resort
headline.print_headline: Macau Mogul Hopes Dinosaurs Trump Volcanoes in New Casino Resort

snippet: Macau tycoon David Chow is ripping up the fake volcano and Roman amphitheatre that were the show pieces of a failed theme park he built in the Chinese gaming enclave seven years ago....
